title: Approval to the Project shall be given by the SRA within a period of 60 days from the date of submission of all relevant documents
clause_text: Approval to the Project shall be given by the SRA within a period of 60 days from the date of submission of all relevant documents. In the event of failure by SRA to do so, the said approval shall be deemed to have been given, provided the Project is in accordance with the provisions of these Regulations. The SRA while giving the approval may lay down terms and conditions as may be necessary.
section: Building Permission for Slum Rehabilitation Project

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
